snippet.title: Drawn: Trail of Shadows -- OFFICIAL Trailer (HD)
snippet.description:
Drawn: Trail of Shadows
Get it free for iPad: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/drawn-trail-shadows-collectors/id530579444?mt=8
Developer: Big Fish Studios
Publisher: Big Fish Games
Release Date: October 21, 2011

Drawn: Trail of Shadows is the third installment in the Drawn franchise. It tells the story of a young boy trapped in the painted world by an evil wizard, as told to Iris, the protagonist of the first two games, by her grandfather.

Follow Drawn on Facebook! https://www.facebook.com/drawngame
